entities.name: bellatrix lestrange
entities.description: Bellatrix Lestrange is mentioned as Sirius's killer and the one who might inherit his house. ("Bellatrix Lestrange, Sirius’s killer, inherit his house?")

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as Bellatrix's victim and the owner of a house with enchantments placed upon it. ("Bellatrix Lestrange, Sirius’s killer, inherit his house?")

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who has placed enchantments on the house and is trying to clarify the position of ownership. ("We do not kn ow whether the enchantments we ourselves have placed upon it...")

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as someone who shouts at Dumbledore and the Dursleys to remove their glasses. ("‘Will you get these ruddy things off us?’")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who looks around when Uncle Vernon shouts. ("Harry looked round; all three of the Dursleys were cower- ing with their arms over their heads...")
